text_block_list.text:
――I wanted to do something about Katsuragi Ace's homesickness. 
With that in mind, I bought several books, including one 
titled 『My First Kitchen Garden』.

If I can learn this properly, then I should be able 
to help her alleviate some of that loneliness――

Huh, is that Trainer-san? Whoa, that looks like 
a really heavy bag there. Is it all books?
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
choice_data_list: <size=43>Yeah, just something I wanted to learn</size>
<size=43>Yeah, just something I wanted to learn</size>

text_block_list.text:
You're studying on your days off too!? 
……Haa~, sounds like being a trainer is pretty rough.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
choice_data_list: Well, it's not work-related though――

text_block_list.text:
Alright, I've made up my mind! 
Let's take it easy today! Trainer-san!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
Just the other day you were so worn out, 
so once in a while should be fine, right? 
C'mon, I'll lead the way! ――To my secret base!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
And, we're here! What do you think, Trainer-san? 
It's just run-down enough to make it perfect, don't you think?
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
choice_data_list: Ace, do you come here often?
Ace, do you come here often?

text_block_list.text:
Hmmmm……it's more like, before I realize it, 
I end up here, I guess? The air reminds me 
of home, and it just some how calms me down!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: ――HaaaaAAAAA!
text_block_list.name: Young Ace

text_block_list.text:
There, go for it, go for it! 
Waahaaha! You were really fast, huh~.
text_block_list.name: Neighborly Old Man

text_block_list.text:
Yeah! ……Ace! If you're starting to get scared, c'mon over here! 
This old lady's got some tea for ya.
text_block_list.name: Neighborly Old Lady

text_block_list.text:
Wonder if that old man and woman are doing well. It'd be 
nice if the radishes they're growing are big this year too.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
choice_data_list: Big radishes?

text_block_list.text:
Y'see, there was this big athletics competition 
we had back in our district. In the Relay races, 
we'd use 『Radishes』 instead of batons!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
……Ahaaha! I guess it's natural you'd make 
a face like that! Just so you know, afterwards 
we'd all eat those radishes! And then――
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
You could tell by the way Katsuragi Ace talked 
about it, she really loved her hometown, and 
the people in her hometown really loved her.

Maybe that's why she felt so homesick. She probably came to 
this place just so she could feel closer to her hometown.

I may not be anything like the people from her 
hometown, but I wanted to do something about 
her loneliness, even if it was just a little……

Oh, sorry! Trainer-san, this was meant to 
be a change of pace for you, but I ended up 
talking so much……it was boring wasn't it?
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
choice_data_list: No, it was really fun
No, it was really fun

text_block_list.text:
In that case, I'm glad! I'm starting to get hungry, 
so we should probably head back! ――Hm?
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: 『My First Kitchen Garden』? This is……
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
choice_data_list: Ah……

text_block_list.text:
So that 『Something I wanted to learn』 wasn't something 
to do with training, but it was about that field?
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
It's not like I was trying to hide it, but it still felt awkward. 
With a wry smile, I held the book in my hand.
choice_data_list: I wasn't ready to give up just yet

text_block_list.text:
There was no reason for you to worry about what happened 
last time though. You're already so busy after all……
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
choice_data_list: I meant about you
I meant about you

text_block_list.text:
The important thing was neither the fieldwork nor fixing 
mistakes. It was to cheer up Katsuragi Ace, just that.
choice_data_list: <size=43>I don't want to give up on helping you</size>
<size=43>I don't want to give up on helping you</size>

text_block_list.text:
Truthfully, there probably wasn't much I could help with. 
But, even just going from 0 to 1 was worth it. So――
choice_data_list: Let me help with the field!
Let me help with the field!

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san…… 
――Got it. That spirit, I'll accept it!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
Let's do the fieldwork! It'll be really early in the morning, 
so I don't want to hear any complaints, got it?
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
That's right! If we're doing this, we might as well study 
together too! If there's anything you don't get, I'll teach ya!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: Several days later――

……Hmmm~, like this, there's too much leftover. 
When thinning these out, it's fine to go rougher!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
choice_data_list: I-is that so……?
I-is that so……?

text_block_list.text:
Alright! Guess that's about it for this spot. 
……Trainer-san! How's it looking over there~?
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
choice_data_list: W-with just a bit more time……!

text_block_list.text:
Hmmm, these rows look just about ready, 
next is the fertilizer……
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
choice_data_list: Ace, come look at this!
Ace, come look at this!

text_block_list.text:
Hm? ……Oooh, awesome! Did you do this entire line!? The balance 
is perfect. Trainer-san you're a pretty quick learner, huh~.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: But――
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
You've got dirt on you here, you know? 
……And, got it.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: Hahaa, seems like you're a little lacking here, huh~!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
Alright! Then, let's get the rest of it all wrapped up! 
Trainer-san, I'll leave that side to you!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
――And you see, on those leaves was another caterpillar, 
but, this time Trainer-san got it and released 
it themself without so much as a peep~.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
『Oh~ isn't that amazing!? Last time you told 
me they just fell all over themself, too』
text_block_list.name: Ace's Mom

text_block_list.text:
『……But I'm glad, looks like you're doing well! Last time 
we talked, you seemed a little off so I was worried』
text_block_list.name: Ace's Mom

text_block_list.text:
『Guess it really is better to work the fields 
together with someone, huh~. I'd be really 
lonely if I was alone too, you know!』
text_block_list.name: Ace's Mom

text_block_list.text:
Hahaa, I guess so! 
Yeah……it really does seem like that.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
Alright, before Trainer-san gets here, 
guess I'll do a quick check for bugs~……oh, ah.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
choice_data_list: M-morning, Ace! It's cold today, huh
M-morning, Ace! It's cold today, huh

text_block_list.text:
――Oh! Morning, Trainer-san! 
……Ah, Hahaa! That's some wild bed head ya got there!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
(Mom's right. Since I came here, I guess I was 
getting used to doing the work alone, but……)
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
(In the dim light, just having someone respond. And 
having someone to wipe off the last bit of dirt on my face.)
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: (With just something like that, with just that……I――)
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
『――Well then, talk to you later. If you ever feel you're 
missing home, you're welcome to come back anytime』
text_block_list.name: Ace's Mom

text_block_list.text:
Yeah. Thanks, Mom. 
……but I'm fine, there's nothing to worry about.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: ――Because, I have Trainer-san with me after all.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
